page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: The importance of{St.Marys Church}is different than it would have been 200 years ago.Up to then it was the{oldest {church in town,}and up to about 120 years ago it was the only church in town.It goes back in history to about the{11th century.}It's important historically and it's important in that it has the{biggest congregation {in Ealing. The clubs and organisations the church organizes are fewer than there would have been 20 years ago because now the church tends to set up mixed organisations to make up a christian family. {Prebendary Saward}has lived in Ealing for seven years and does not think this part of Ealing has had a major change in that time.
